name: Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude
name_original: Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude
description:
Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude is an arcade game developed by High Voltage Software. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by Vivendi Universal Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Leisure Suit Larry: Magna Cum Laude is available on PC and PlayStation 2.
